message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $170. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I'm interested in the product, but $170 is a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $140

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand that $170 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $155. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $155 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. This is my final offer

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $145. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
